meanings.definition: To expose to danger or harm.
meanings.sent1: Running in the street endangers your safety.
meanings.sent2: Not wearing a helmet while biking endangers your head.
meanings.sent3: Eating spicy food endangers my taste buds!
meanings.sent4: Ignoring warning signs endangers your well-being.
meanings.sent5: Playing with fire endangers your fingers.

meanings.definition: To put at risk of injury or loss.
meanings.sent1: Leaving the door unlocked endangers your valuables.
meanings.sent2: Investing all your money in one stock endangers your savings.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting your umbrella endangers your dry clothes!
meanings.sent4: Skipping breakfast endangers your energy levels.
meanings.sent5: Driving without a seatbelt endangers your life.
